title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table appear in different formats in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should display in the same format in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Check the format of the values in the dynamic text item.
3. Check the format of the values in the data/text item.
